00015 bool StemAnalyzer::analyze(const TermList& input, TermList& output){
00016         TermList::const_iterator it = input.begin();
00017         string strTerm,strStem;
00018         UString tgt;
00019         for(; it != input.end(); it ++){
00020                 Term newTerm(*it);
00021                 if(cache_.getValue(it->text, tgt))
00022                         newTerm.text = tgt;
00023                 else{
00024                         it->text.convertString(strTerm, encodingType_);
00025                         if(stemmer_.stem(strTerm,strStem))
00026                         {
00027                                 UString newUString(strStem, encodingType_);
00028                                 newTerm.text = newUString;
00029                                 cache_.insertValue(it->text,newUString);
00030                         }
00031                 }
00032                 output.push_back(newTerm);
00033         }
00034         return true;
00035 }
